original_title: The Streamliner Case - Recreating The Mercedes-Benz 540K
overview: The cars are world-famous, much sought after by collectors, idolized by car fans -- the Mercedes-Benz 540K, built from 1936 to 1938. For some, these cars represent the ultimate in vehicle design. Here is the story of Mercedes-Benz recreating one forgotten version of this beautiful vehicle.
title: The Streamliner Case - Recreating The Mercedes-Benz 540K
